text: I'm looking for a restaurant called Anatolia.
Anatolia is a Turkish restaurant located at 30 Bridge Street in the City Centre area. It's a moderate-priced restaurant. You can give them a call at 01223 362372. Would you like to reserve a table?
I'd like to book a table for 5 people at 14:15 on Monday.
I've booked a table for 5 people at Anatolia for Monday at 14:15. Your reservation number is 421. Please arrive 10 minutes prior to your booking time.
Thank you, I have the reference number 421. What if the booking fails, are there other restaurants in the same area and price range I can consider?

If your booking at Anatolia fails, you have several other options in the same area and price range. Here are a few recommendations:

1. Efes Restaurant (King Street City Centre) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
2. Restaurant Tandoori Cambridge (6 Lensfield Road) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
3. Ali (47-53 Regent Street) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
4. Curry House (Jesus Lane Fen Ditton) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
5. Golden Margherita (40210 Millers Yard City Centre) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
6. Don (59 Hills Road City Centre) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
7. La Slug (21 Burleigh Street City Centre) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.
8. Lan Restaurant (83 Regent Street) - a Turkish restaurant with a moderate price range.

Please note that availability and prices may vary.

Thank you for the alternatives. Now, I'm all set to go to Anatolia. Thank you for your help, I appreciate it! Goodbye.

END

It was my pleasure to assist you. I hope you have a great time at Anatolia and enjoy your meal. If you need any more help or have any other questions in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Goodbye!
